1561030213_1GJc2vm4vJjAKsFoFJ2D3gGmKiRac.body:
I am a normal user from China. In our country, many connections to zeronet are blocked by GFW. A small number of users are divided into two ways, one is vpn (so users will be marked as other countries), and the other is to use nodes that are not blocked (easily subject to government review)
And zeronet is just a small tool in China (possibly because the official website is blocked). Most people don't have much demand. We use ssr to connect to foreign internet.
If you want to know more, you can contact me by email. Zeromail
